bibl.title: Textual Criticism in the Light of Diverse Textual Evidence for the Greek New Testament: An Expanded Proposal.

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.title: New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World
bibl.author: PORTER, Stanley E.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Some Factors in New Testament Textual Criticism. - 3. Documents to Consider for the Second Category of Manuscripts [i.e. those manuscripts for which there is doubt as to their continuous nature]: a. Lectionary and liturgical texts; - b. Miniature codices and magical papyri / amulets; - c. Commentaries; - d. Apocryphal texts; - e. Excerpts; - f. Unknown. - 4. Conclusion.
